/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with trees and buildings, is filled with cars and pedestrians, adding a dynamic element to the image. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
